Conversation

Class Conversation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Conversation.Conversation

  • public class Conversation
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Conversation. Contains the ingredients necessary for a conversation between 2 people, including 2 People, a current topic, previous topics, etc.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Topic currentTopic
      The current topic of conversation.
      protected Person initiator
      The initiator of the conversation.
      protected java.util.LinkedList<Statement> prevStatements
      The previous statements in the conversation.
      protected java.util.LinkedList<Topic> prevTopics
      The previous topics in the conversation.
      protected Person responder
      The responder to the initiator of the conversation.

        responder - the responder

    • Method Detail

      • say

        public void say(Person talker,
       Statement statement,
       Person listener)
        Forces the specified talker to say the statement provided to the listener. Does not require minimum requirements or use anything "A.I." Mainly intended for debugging.
        Parameters:
        talker - the talker
        statement - the statement
        listener - the listener

      • nextStatement

        public void nextStatement()
        The last person who was listening makes a statement to the last person who was talking. Using "A.I." to determine what statement to say.

      • nextStatement

        public void nextStatement(Person talker,
                 Person listener)
        The talker specified says another statement to the listener. Using the "A.I." to filter through the possible statements.
        Parameters:
        talker - the talker
        listener - the listener
